snippet.title: Assetto Corsa Competizione, Intercontinental GT Pack DLC trailer [PEGI]
snippet.description:
The Intercontinental GT Pack DLC introduces 4 iconic international circuits in Assetto Corsa Competizione: Kyalami Grand Prix Circuit (South Africa), Suzuka Circuit (Japan), Weathertech®️ Raceway Laguna Seca (USA) & Mount Panorama Circuit (Australia). These tracks extend the GT Series to the Intercontinental GT Challenge, providing an unforgivable and challenging driving experience thanks to their exclusive layout finely reproduced using Laserscan®️ technology, allowing for an extreme precision in detail. The DLC also features more than 45 new car liveries, 30 new teams and 50 new drivers in addition to new game modes, all from the real-life Intercontinental GT Challenge powered by Pirelli.

For behind the scenes details on all of 505's games, head to the official 505 Games Blog: http://www.505games.com/blog
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/505Games
Twitter: https://twitter.com/505_Games
